subdisciplines.name: Neurologic Music Therapy
subdisciplines.description: The use of music-based interventions to achieve therapeutic goals for individuals with neurological conditions.

subdisciplines.name: Psychotherapeutic Music Therapy
subdisciplines.description: The use of music as part of psychotherapy to promote emotional, cognitive, and social change.

subdisciplines.name: Developmental Music Therapy
subdisciplines.description: The use of music-based interventions to promote developmental goals for children with delays and disabilities.
